<title level="1" right="Spell 5" pfs="Standard">[Belittling Boast](/Spells.aspx?ID=1278)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=16" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Fear" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=68" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Firebrands](/Sources.aspx?ID=196) pg. 88</row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 30-foot burst

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You boast about your skills or combat prowess, bolstering your own abilities and belittling your opponents. Select one of the following to boast about: melee attack rolls, ranged attack rolls, spell attack rolls, or a single skill. Attempt an [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) check to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53) all enemies within 30 feet. Each creature that becomes [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) additionally takes a –1 circumstance penalty to the attack roll or skill you boasted about for 1 minute. If at least one creature becomes frightened, you gain a +1 status penalty to the attack roll or skill you boasted about for 1 minute.

---
**Heightened (8th)** The bonus and penalty increase to 2.
name: Belittling Boast
